text:
Stacktical | DevOps | Paris, Tokyo | REMOTE, CONTRACT, FULL-TIME, https://stacktical.com

Stacktical helps companies of all sizes do Capacity Planning effortlessly, using predictive technologies and AI. We are looking for DevOps profiles to accompany our customers in their Capacity Planning endeavours and actively participate in building the Stacktical SaaS platform.

If you are interested in working using great technology, with a no-bs mindset team of digital nomads, please contact us at founders+me@stacktical.com with the subject “Working at Stacktical”.

Keywords: DevOps, CI, CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, Azure, Beach
